name: Jack Exploring the Platformer
description:
Hello, i'm Yashmerino. I have been dreaming to make a game since childhood, and here is the result. Jack Exploring the Platformer is my first finished game, where a little guy named Jack, is exploring the platformer, obviously lol. The game requires a lot of polishing, but i'm lazy c:

I made this small game using free assets, here are the credits:

8 Bits Music Pack: https://destiny-knight.itch.io/free-8-bits-music-pack-2

200 Free SFX: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx

Heart Pack: https://gamedevelopershlok.itch.io/heartpack

371 Simple Buttons: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/371-simple-buttons-pack-97516

Pixel Adventure 1: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360

Jack Exploring the Platformer on GitHub: https://github.com/Yashmerino/J-E-T-P
